trigger.name: Flow sessions (10% Available)
trigger.description:
>90% Reaching Device limits
Actions: Review traffic patterns Look for sessions with high inactivity timeouts Review Device type

trigger.name: Flow sessions (20% Available)
trigger.description:
80% -90 of Max PFE Sessions may be considered normal depending upon network traffic but requires investigation if increase is sudden
Actions: Review traffic patterns Look for sessions with high inactivity timeouts Review Device type

trigger.name: High CPU temperature on firewall {HOSTNAME} node0
High CPU temperature on firewall {HOSTNAME} node1

trigger.expression: {Basic Juniper SNMP with traps:snmptrap["JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB"].regexp(jnxCmCfgChange)} and {Basic Juniper SNMP with traps:snmptrap["JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB"].nodata(1h)}=0
trigger.name: Juniper startup config changed on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Basic Juniper SNMP with traps:snmptrap["JUNIPER-SYSLOG-MIB"].regexp(LOGIN_FAILED)} and {Basic Juniper SNMP with traps:snmptrap["JUNIPER-SYSLOG-MIB"].nodata(1h)}=0
trigger.name: Login Auth Error on {HOST.NAME}
{HOSTNAME} node0 high PFE CPU usage
trigger.description:
>95% Device responsiveness for transit traffic is likely to be impacted including session buildup
Actions: Review Traffic pattern Review PPS Review Session counts

trigger.name: {HOSTNAME} node0 high PFE Memory usage
trigger.description:
>95% Transit traffic may be impacted due to inability for forwarding operations
Actions: Review system logs Verify configuration for unused features that be removed Disable non needed ALGs

trigger.name: {HOSTNAME} node0 high RE CPU usage
trigger.description:
>95% Device responsiveness for self traffic is likely to be impacted
Actions: Disable traceoptions Clean up storage Verify system processes

trigger.name: {HOSTNAME} node0 high RE Memory usage
trigger.description:
>95% Device will begin active memory clean up attempts
Actions: Verify routing table size Verify System Processes in use Review system logs

trigger.name: {HOSTNAME} node1 high PFE CPU usage
trigger.description:
>95% Device responsiveness for transit traffic is likely to be impacted including session buildup
Actions: Review Traffic pattern Review PPS Review Session counts

trigger.name: {HOSTNAME} node1 high PFE Memory usage
trigger.description:
>95% Transit traffic may be impacted due to inability for forwarding operations
Actions: Review system logs Verify configuration for unused features that be removed Disable non needed ALGs

trigger.name: {HOSTNAME} node1 high RE CPU usage
trigger.description:
>95% Device responsiveness for self traffic is likely to be impacted
Actions: Disable traceoptions Clean up storage Verify system processes

trigger.name: {HOSTNAME} node1 high RE Memory usage
trigger.description:
>95% Device will begin active memory clean up attempts
Actions: Verify routing table size Verify System Processes in use Review system logs
